sub_title: Global Business Development | Product Management | Innovation
summary: As a results-driven Business Development Professional, I have amassed extensive experience in the creation and deployment of new services and customer value propositions including innovative go-to-market strategies and business models. I can design complex monetization strategies based on intensive market research and analysis to drive revenue attainment and customer engagement. As a skilled project leader, I can coordinate resources and spearhead high-value global initiatives with input into all phases from scoping and analysis to execution and ongoing stakeholder support. I am a customer-centric professional with a passion for deploying technology solutions as a key driver of long-term growth, innovation, and value. As a collaborative communicator (Bi-Lingual English and Russian) and relationship builder, I can foster strategic alliances to enable new market entries (India, Russia, US, Indonesia, China). I am a flexible and adaptable team player with an aptitude for implementing complex pilot projects and continually re-aligning milestones and deliverables. I can manage, train, and mentor cross-functional teams. My tireless work ethic makes me a valuable addition to any organization.
